For , volunteer neck pain 90 day , gender , age 18 59 year bilateral myofascial trigger point upper trapezius randomize follow group : group 1 ( kinesiotherapy , n = 20 ) , group 2 ( kinesiotherapy + static ultrasound , n = 20 ) , group 3 ( kinesiotherapy + diadynamic current , n = 20 ) group 4 ( untreated control , n = 20 ) .
